title: still the riot to enter the pbe? without reaches level 30?
body: still the riot to enter the pbe? without reaches level 30?

replies.body:
You don't necessarily **have** to be level 30, as sometimes we're looking to test some features specifically for newer players, but for the most part, we look for *really active* players, which tends to be level 30s. 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on how we choose testers. Let me know if you have any questions.
